title: Anyone Knows This Font
content:
Please somebody can help me, anyone recognize this font ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804055736im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_5255.jpg)
author: nixk

comments.content:
/me scratches head...

'Fraid not, but if you click on "Font ID" (to the right or at the top of this page) and repost there, you should get a good answer. That is where they-who-know-fonts hang out.

Exo Medium looks like a good match.  
 [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/exo](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804055736/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/exo)
Nope, my bad. Font ID forum is over here ...sigh.
